entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:28 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:28 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
